attributes.action: request the Archbishops to call for a National Day of Penitence and Prayer to seek forgiveness for our corporate and individual greed and to ask for strength to be mindful of the needs of others in all our dealings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would be best done in conjunction with the Leader of the Opposition. As history has frequently shown us, everything begins to unravel when we forget God!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
